execution_quality: No execution occurred; the agent received a cut-off prompt and had no opportunity to respond or request clarification before the session ended.
work_category: Incomplete task prompt received with truncated request, session terminated before any work could begin or be clarified.
summary: The session received a truncated email categorization prompt that cut off mid-sentence without providing complete instructions or email content. No agent work was performed and the session terminated without clarification or follow-up, making task completion impossible.
follow_up_pattern: Session ended abruptly; no follow-up expected without user re-engagement with a complete prompt.
